title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt to be well-made, soft, and comfortable, with great material that exceeds expectations. They appreciate its style, with one customer noting it can be dressed up or down, and they like the color accuracy, with one mentioning it's a beautiful rust shade for fall. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater!
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater! So soft. Great quality. Perfect fit, true to size. Length is great for jeans or trousers. Could be tucked or left out. Cute with leggings too! Read more
items.author: Beth Bell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality!
items.body: This sweater is amazing. The quality is perfect and you would expect to pay a lot more for it. You definitely get your money worth- the value is too notch. I love wearing it partially tucked in, you can dress it up or down. The color is true to what is shown in the picture. The length is good, it goes past the top of my jeans and I would say I have an average sized torso. I have washed and dried it and did not experience any shrinkage. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love these tops, but sizing inconsistent.
items.body: I have ordered the pink which appears to no longer be available, the almond and rust. I loved the pink so much that I decide to get the other two. The almond color was not for me and it was a lot bigger than the pink and rust. The rust is slightly smaller than the pink but doable. All are similar quality and feel which is awesome. Read more
items.author: Jenny Lee SA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality
items.body: Just as pictured. Color is perfect and the fabric exceeded expectations! It’s super soft and stretchy material that’s really comfortable. I bought 2 and plan to go back for more. Fit is perfectly oversized just as shown. I bought my usual size which is a medium. Love this seller so much! Read more
items.author: lizzy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Boxy and Shapeless
items.body: Color is just as pictured and sizing was right. I’m 5’6”, 128lbs with a narrow frame and small worked great. Although I liked the fabric because it’s thickish and warm, it doesn’t “hang” like the model in the picture. It’s got a little bit of a boxy or “bubbly” shape. I wish it would hang and flow more, if that makes sense. Read more
items.author: Tracey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
items.body: LOVE this sweater, fits so well and the material is so good! Read more
items.author: Cathlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love!
items.body: I LOVE this sweatshirt! I now have 5 colors and during the winter wear one almost every day for working from home. Throw on a couple of gold necklaces and earrings and I’m ready for any Zoom call. The colors are all steadfast after washing many times. The quality is excellent and great value for the money! These are stretchy to pull over your head but retain their shape even after washing once a week for over a year. They are soft to touch inside and warm but not hot. I’m a medium and these are true to size. My favorite thing is probably the rib knitting around the cuffs! If you’re considering, order now - you won’t regret it! Read more
items.author: Lmurph

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality, cute and cozy!
items.body: I have purchased multiple colors and sizes of this sweater because I like it a lot! It is very soft material and stays pretty soft after washing (though it does tend to pill a bit). It has good stretch and a flattering, slouchy fit. Good at disguising my postpartum belly. I'm 5'8" so it doesn't fully cover the booty, but may on someone shorter than I am. The texture on the outside gives it an extra bit of class and interest. I can dress it up for work or wear it around the house. Looks cute with a front tuck or just normal. There is also a long cuff type part that makes folding up the sleeves look intentional. Very happy with this product! Read more
items.author: AD28

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Rust, Opal Green, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Dusty Blue, Red, Almond, Khaki, Pink, White, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
